name: DOT36563 ITP - Safety Barrier Installation, NDD and Service Location
template name: DOT36563 ITP - Safety Barrier Installation, NDD and Service Location Rev1

name: 1.1 - Obtain up to date Dial Before You Dig (DBYD) Information
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All current DBYD information received prior to commencement of works
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed + documentation received
1.2 - Obtain necessary approvals and permits from the relevant service authorities
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All current permits approved and issued prior to commencement of works
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed + Permits issued
1.3 - Receival and activation of authorised Memorandum of Authorisation (MOA)
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The Contractor shall not commence work until the relevant authorised MOA has been received and activated
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed + Authorised MOA's received
1.4 - Submission of relevant PMP Documentation, insurances etc.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All PMP documentation submitted to DTP 14 days prior to commencement of works. This includes QMP, EMP, IERP, TMP, HSMP, SWMS
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Works procedures for GPP process, NDD, Service Location and TreeTrimming/Removal to be submitted to DTP 14 days prior to commencement of works
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Fulton Hogan works procedures
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: List of contractor representatives submitted to DTP
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The Traffic Management Plan shall not be implemented as a Traffic Guidance Scheme until the Superintendent has completed the review of the final Traffic Management Plan and released this Hold Point
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: First batch of MOA's and TGS's submitted for approval to be audited by an external auditor.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed + RSA report received
RESPONSIBILITY: Project Manager, Site Engineer, Superintendent
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Undertake precondition inspection of site prior to works commencing
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: MP4 / video file for records
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
RESPONSIBILITY: Site Engineer, Project Manager, Foreman
FREQUENCY: Prior to removal of signs
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The required positions of all posts and signs shall be as directed by the Superintendent who shall confirm the positions before the erection of posts commences.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
FREQUENCY: Prior to excavation, stripping, clearing/grubbing, ground penetration
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All underground services must be located by a suitably qualified service locator. Where denoted NDD in the drawings, services must be visually inspected
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
RESPONSIBILITY: Site Engineer, Foreman, GPP, Subcontractor
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: NDD locations confirmed within 10 working days from submission of prior to completion of Non Destructive Digging (NDD) works
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: NDD information supplied to DTP a minimum of 14 days prior to any works commencing on any safety barrier run.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
FREQUENCY: Prior to leaving site for the day
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Potholes refilled with compacted sand the same day
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Meeting held with DTP and Council to identify and mark trees / vegetation for removal and approval permits issued
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
RESPONSIBILITY: Site Engineer, Project Manager, Superintendent, Council Representative
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Trees to be trimmed in accordance with specification and in designated locations as per drawings and Superintendent's advice
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
RESPONSIBILITY: Foreman, Superintendent, Council representative, Subcontractor
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Trees can only be removed with the approval of Council Representative and Superintendent. All tree matter removed from site and holes left from tree stumps filled accordingly.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
RESPONSIBILITY: Foreman, Superintendent, Council representative, Subcontractor

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Prior to installation the Contractor shall confirm with the Superintendent the required location and length of all guard fence. Barriers to be set out in accordance with contract documentation and VR specification
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
RESPONSIBILITY: Site Engineer, Foreman, Superintendent, Subcontractor
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Details provided to DTP and proposed location for ground beam approved prior to installation
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
RESPONSIBILITY: Site Engineer, Project Manager, Superintendent, Subcontractor
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All safety barriers installed within VR and Manufacturers Speficiation
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The Contractor shall submit to the Superintendent all test certificates related to the supply of steel for the Works at least 14 days prior to commencement of installation.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Certificates of Compliance issues for all barriers installed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Submission of As-Constructed drawings to DTP within 20 days of practical completion
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
